The Beautiful Apocalypse: Hash & Hedge Chronicles

By Oliver Perry

Christ almighty, I just crawled through Hash & Hedge’s daily briefings and I feel like I’ve been mainlining pure capitalism mixed with algorithmic cocaine. These beautiful bastards are documenting the real-time collapse and reconstruction of everything we thought we knew about money, power, and the weight of a goddamn cell.
